The '''Captain of Gondor''' was a military title and position of [[Gondor]].

Prince [[Eärnur]] held the title Captain of Gondor leading the [[Host of the West (Arnor)|Host of the West]] against [[Angmar]] in the [[Battle of Fornost]].<ref>{{app|Gondor}}</ref>

A millennium later, [[Faramir]] also held the title, as the leader of the [[Rangers of Ithilien]].<ref>{{TT|Window}}</ref>
